name: Makeshift Maneuvers
text: Your skill with improvised weapons allows you to use them to hamper your opponents.
prerequisites: Catch Off-Guard or Throw Anything, base attack bonus +1.
benefit: When you wield an improvised weapon, it gains the disarm and trip weapon properties.
text_zh: 你使用临时武器的技巧可以用它们阻碍对手。
benefit_zh: 当你持用临时武器时，它获得摔绊和卸武武器特性。
